item.title: [CLIENT SIDED]Custom Objects not appearing
item.dc:creator: @xaviergmail xaviergmail
item.description:
@xaviergmail wrote:

Hello!
I’m remaking the edgeville bank in a 317 and I need cordons (separators or w/e…) like there are in Varrock!

What I did:
5 minute model
added model into client
added the int.

What I think went wrong:
The ints…

Basically what i did for my object ints was adding

[code]
if (i == 1001) {
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_753.anInt1406 = anIntArray755[630];
class46.method582(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_753);
class46.aStringArray786 = new String[0];
class46.aString739 = “Cordon”;
class46.aByteArray777 = “Acts as a small barrier”.getBytes();
class46.anIntArray773= new int[1];
class46.anIntArray773[0] = 10000;

}[/code]

Right under

class46.method573(); class46.method582(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_753);
in Class46

The problem is that the object 1001 doesen’t show up? it’s invisible!

Help would be greatly appreciated!

Read full topic
